description: Multi-agent deep research workflow with HITL requirements gathering: interviewer gathers requirements, sourcer gathers sources, analyst proposes hypotheses, researcher builds theories, disprover critiques in iterative loop until 95% confidence, writer synthesizes final report

complete.sourcer: Requirements gathered, ready to source information

complete.analyst: Sources collected and ready for analysis

blocked.core: Cannot source - technical issues or unclear topic

complete.researcher: Analysis complete - hypotheses formulated and ready for theory synthesis

blocked.core: Cannot analyze - conflicting or unclear data

complete.disprover: Theory synthesized - ready for critical review

low-confidence.disprover: Confidence below 95% - needs critical review before completion

blocked.core: Cannot synthesize - insufficient analysis or conflicting evidence

complete.analyst: Critical review complete - counterpoints and gaps identified for refinement

high-confidence.writer: Theory validated - confidence threshold met, ready for final synthesis

blocked.core: Cannot critique - insufficient evidence or unclear theory

complete.core: Article written and saved to research/

needs-clarification.analyst: Need more context or clearer analysis for article

blocked.core: Cannot write - insufficient material or unclear direction
